rotate.description: Customize the loading icon with or without a rotation animation
rotate.description_zh: 自定义的加载图标是否有旋转动画

show.description: Whether the Spin is active or not when filling in the content, it does not take effect when the Spin is used directly
show.description_zh: 在填入内容的情况下 Spin 是否激活，直接使用 Spin 时不生效

:stroke-width.description: The relative width of the edge of the Spin, assuming the outer radius of the Spin is 100
:stroke-width.description_zh: Spin 边缘的相对宽度，假定 Spin 的外侧半径是 100

:delay.description: Delay the time it takes to load the effect in milliseconds (to avoid flickering)
:delay.description_zh: 延迟显示加载效果的时间, 单位为毫秒（避免闪烁）
